reuters.title: GRUMMAN <GQ> WINS 28 MLN DLR CONTRACT
reuters.body: Grumman Corp said it was awarded a 28 mln dlr contract by McDonnell Douglas Corp <MD> to develop flight control surfaces for the United States Air Force's new C-17 transport aircraft. Grumman said it will design, develop and build the ailerons, rudders and elevators for the transport. The company said the production phase of the contract has a potential value of about 300 mln dlrs. Reuter 
